text: Gregory John Stanton (born March 8, 1970) is an American politician. He is the member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Arizona's 9th district since January 3, 2019. He was Mayor of Phoenix. He won the November 8, 2011 runoff election to replace mayor Phil Gordon. Stanton was sworn in as 59th Mayor of Phoenix in January 2012 Stanton sworn in as new Phoenix mayor and resigned on May 29, 2018 in order to run for U.S. Congress. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Arizona Category:Mayors of Phoenix, Arizona Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from Phoenix, Arizona Category:Lawyers from Phoenix, Arizona Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Greg Stanton
